proof_script:
lemma restrict_state_measure[measurable]: "(\<lambda>x. restrict x V') \<in> measurable (state_measure (V \<union> V') \<Gamma>) (state_measure V' \<Gamma>)"
by (auto intro!: measurable_restrict simp: state_measure_def state_measure'_def)
